thread.title: TRUDY
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by TRUDY

author: TRUDY
title: TRUDY
text: The staff were great at Redspot and we had no issues with reservations, driving, key drop off etc with our rental of a People Mover. The only thing I would recommend is more details on configuration of their people movers. We had 7 people and golf gear, bags to carry and it was a tight squeeze. We also didn't realise you lose a seat if you need to store baggage. Otherwise would highly rate Redspot....
